trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> da e verso altri tipi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Expression> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Expression>non deve utilizzare un percorso di conversione di tipo per convertire i valori (deve utilizzare le estensioni di markup).</xref:System.Windows.Expression>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Per questo motivo, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>restituiscono sempre `false`.</xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>sempre generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo di testo XAML

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert from a source object to an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il convertitore può convertire da un oggetto di origine a un <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> che fornisce un contesto di formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo a cui si desidera effettuare la conversione.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to a specific destination type.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il convertitore può convertire un <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> oggetto a un tipo di destinazione specifico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> che fornisce un contesto di formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo che si desidera convertire.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Converte il valore specificato per il <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> che fornisce un contesto di formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>da utilizzare come impostazioni cultura correnti.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genera un'eccezione e restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto fornito <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> oggetto nel tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> che fornisce un contesto di formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>da utilizzare come impostazioni cultura correnti.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo che si desidera convertire.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genera un'eccezione e restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
